description: If you're looking for a healthier alternative to yuro&nbsp;standard margarita, look no further! This Kombucha Margarita recipe is made with&nbsp;tequila, fresh lime juice, and kombucha, and is perfect for any occasion. This cocktail is fizzy, tart, and just a tad sweet—great for satisfying your thirst. So give this healthy margarita recipe a try today! You won't be disappointed.
name: Kombucha Margarita

6 oz. Plain kombucha (or flavor of choice for a flavored margarita!)
